name: @wpmudev/shared-ui
description: For internal use in WPMU DEV plugins
author: WPMU DEV

scripts.v:pkg: gulp update:version && gulp build && git add -A && git commit -m ":package:"
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run v:pkg && npm version patch --allow-same-version && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run v:pkg && npm version minor --allow-same-version && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run v:pkg && npm version major --allow-same-version && npm publish
